text: When I Have Fears is the debut studio album by Irish post-punk band, The Murder Capital. The album was released on 16 August 2019 through Human Season Records. == Critical reception == Upon its release, When I Have Fears received acclaim from contemporary music critics. On review aggregation websites Metacritic and AnyDecentMusic?, When I Have Fears has an average weighted rating of 82 out of 100 based on eight critic reviews. On review aggregation website Album of the Year, When I Have Fears has an average rating of 87 out of 100 based on 11 ratings. == Track listing == == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- ! scope="row"| French Albums (SNEP) | 146 |- |- |- |} == References == == External links == * Category:2019 debut albums Category:The Murder Capital albums Category:Albums produced by Flood (producer)
